feed.title: CVMI
feed.subtitle: An engaging 1-3 sentence description of your lab.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2023. 11] Congratulations! Satyawant’s paper “RSSGLT: Remote Sensing Image Segmentation Network based on Global-Local Transformer” has been accepted in IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters (SCI, JCR-IF: 4.8, Top 10.9%)
entry.summary: [2023. 11] Congratulations! Satyawant’s paper “RSSGLT: Remote Sensing Image Segmentation Network based on Global-Local Transformer” has been accepted in IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters (SCI, JCR-IF: 4.8, Top 10.9%)

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2023. 10] Congratulations! Hye-Seong’s paper, “Robust Unsupervised Domain Adaptation by Retaining Confident Entropy via Edge Concatenation,” has been accepted in Expert Systems With Applications (SCI, JCR-IF: 8.5, Top 6.4%).
entry.summary: [2023. 10] Congratulations! Hye-Seong’s paper, “Robust Unsupervised Domain Adaptation by Retaining Confident Entropy via Edge Concatenation,” has been accepted in Expert Systems With Applications (SCI, JCR-IF: 8.5, Top 6.4%).

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2023. 09] Congratulations! Jeong-Cheol’s paper, “제로샷 행동 인식을 위한 멀티모달 크로스 어텐션” has been accepted in KAIC 2023.
entry.summary: [2023. 09] Congratulations! Jeong-Cheol’s paper, “제로샷 행동 인식을 위한 멀티모달 크로스 어텐션” has been accepted in KAIC 2023.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2023. 08] Congratulations! Athul’s paper, “EvolveNet: Evolving Networks by Learning Scale of Depth and Width,” has been accepted in Mathematics (SCI, JCR-IF: 2.4, Top 6.8%).
entry.summary: [2023. 08] Congratulations! Athul’s paper, “EvolveNet: Evolving Networks by Learning Scale of Depth and Width,” has been accepted in Mathematics (SCI, JCR-IF: 2.4, Top 6.8%).

entry.title: News
entry.summary: [2023. 07] Congratulations! Young-Han received an 우수발표논문상 in KCC 2023.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2023. 07] Congratulations! Dr. Abhishek’s paper, “Spherical Search with Epsilon Constraint and Gradient-based Repair Framework for Constrained Optimization,” has been accepted in Swarm and Evolutionary Computation (SCI, JCR-IF: 10.0, Top 5.9%).
entry.summary: [2023. 07] Congratulations! Dr. Abhishek’s paper, “Spherical Search with Epsilon Constraint and Gradient-based Repair Framework for Constrained Optimization,” has been accepted in Swarm and Evolutionary Computation (SCI, JCR-IF: 10.0, Top 5.9%).

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2023. 05] Congratulations! Athul’s paper, “Learning Scale of Depth and Width for Network Evolution,” has been accepted in KCC 2023.
entry.summary: [2023. 05] Congratulations! Athul’s paper, “Learning Scale of Depth and Width for Network Evolution,” has been accepted in KCC 2023.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2023. 05] Congratulations! Young-Han’s paper, “효율적인 집단식사 서비스 제공을 위한 공공기관 구내식당 실데이터 기반의 식수 예측 기계학습 모델연구” has been accepted in KCC 2023.
entry.summary: [2023. 05] Congratulations! Young-Han’s paper, “효율적인 집단식사 서비스 제공을 위한 공공기관 구내식당 실데이터 기반의 식수 예측 기계학습 모델연구” has been accepted in KCC 2023.

entry.title: News
entry.content: [2023. 04] Congratulations! Dr. Abhishek’s paper, “CMA-ES with exponential based multiplicative covariance matrix adaptation for global optimization,” has been accepted in Swarm and Evolutionary Computation (SCI, JCR-IF: 10.267, Top 5.91%).
entry.summary: [2023. 04] Congratulations! Dr. Abhishek’s paper, “CMA-ES with exponential based multiplicative covariance matrix adaptation for global optimization,” has been accepted in Swarm and Evolutionary Computation (SCI, JCR-IF: 10.267, Top 5.91%).
